text:
Sherine- Je comprend pas , pourquoi il a envie de se marier une deuxième fois lui il est fou
[redacted_name]- Arrête de pleurer pour lui ... il mérite pas tes larmes ..
Jennah- Je me met à sa place sa me déchire le cœur j'imagine si demain [redacted_name] m'annonce qu'il va ce marier avec une deuxième femme je supporterais pas ...
- Il a pas honte .. il m'a humilier comme ça devant sa famille mais c'est hors de question je divorce !
Doussa- Calme toi hbiba .. pense à ta fille ...
Nous étions sur le balcon de ma chambre quand Kaîs est arrivé .
[redacted_name]- Y'a du monde ici salem
Elles- Salem
Sherine- Tu déçois cousin
Kaîs- J'ai pas vraiment d'avis à recevoir de ta part
trans:
Sherine- I don't understand why he feels like getting married a second time, he's crazy!
[redacted_name]- Stop crying for him... he isn't worth your tears...
Jennah- I put myself in his shoes, it's heartbreaking. I can't imagine if tomorrow [redacted_name] tells me he's marrying a second wife, I won't be able to stand it ...
- He has no shame .. he humiliated me like that before his family but it's not possible I'm getting a divorce!
Doussa- Calm down hbiba .. you should think about your daughter ...
Kaîs arrived when we were on the balcony of my room.
[redacted_name]- It's busy here Salem
They- Salem
Sherine- Cousin, you disappointed me
Kaîs- I don't really expect any advice from you.
